data.what_is: Event & venue marketing, ticketing & promotions system
data.product_description: Event & venue marketing, ticketing & promotions system

initial_reviews.review_title: One platform to make sure, you have all info about your guest for all your happy times.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MyGuestlist Marketing?
Keep the guest list in a way a one want. A great Platform to manage and collect data formall your guests.

What do you dislike about MyGuestlist Marketing?
Nothing that I can think of, but making enhancement and a few customizations as per the user can rate the tool well.

Recommendations to others considering MyGuestlist Marketing:
If you want to have repetitive customers this is the tool that will make sure they come back.

What problems is MyGuestlist Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mapping customers' glist for our conferences and events organized by our marketing team. This tools helps in aking sure you had attened the event and who dont and then act accordingly. Graet way to manage the overall list

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MyGuestlist Marketing?
It's an easy way to keep my guest list organized for events.

What do you dislike about MyGuestlist Marketing?
Not as customize able as I would like, but it is an excellent leap from our old manual ways of managing a guest list.

Recommendations to others considering MyGuestlist Marketing:
Give it a try!

What problems is MyGuestlist Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
Primarily solving for the chaos that is hosting a corporate event. MyGuestList makes it a breeze to keep track of my attendees and attendon'ts

initial_reviews.review_title: Brilliant online system & great customer support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MyGuestlist Marketing?
The software has made our venue marketing so much easier.  It automates everything and bring in sales.

What do you dislike about MyGuestlist Marketing?
The UX could use some improvement.  Whilst the system is really powerful, it does take a little to get use to because it just does so much!

Recommendations to others considering MyGuestlist Marketing:
Give them a call.  It is amazing how once you set it up properly, it just makes life so easy!

What problems is MyGuestlist Marketing solving and how is that benefiting you?
It makes the marketing of my venue easy.  I can stay in touch with my customers, driving them back in for susequent bookings I usually wouldn't get.  Over the last couple years, MyGuestlist has been responsible for driving most of the return business to my venue.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MyGuestlist Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: The software has made our venue marketing so much easier.  It automates everything and bring in sales.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MyGuestlist Marketing?
review_question_answers.answer: The UX could use some improvement.  Whilst the system is really powerful, it does take a little to get use to because it just does so much!

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering MyGuestlist Marketing:
review_question_answers.answer: Give them a call.  It is amazing how once you set it up properly, it just makes life so easy!
